lead_paragraph: The gunman, who was being transferred from a holding cell to a courtroom in Berrien County, broke free and grabbed a law enforcement officer’s gun.

headline.print_headline: 2 Bailiffs Fatally Shot by Prisoner in Michigan
headline.main: 2 Bailiffs Shot to Death at Michigan Courthouse

snippet: The gunman, who was being transferred from a holding cell to a courtroom in Berrien County, broke free and grabbed a law enforcement officer’s gun....
abstract: Prisoner Larry Darnell Gordon fatally shoots court bailiffs Joseph Zangaro and Ronald Kienzle inside St Joseph, Mich, courthouse with gun he wrested from law enforcement officer; Gordon himself is fatally shot by authorities responding to situation.
